publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3553 John Wilson: Excellent Chryston Primary School HMIe Report—That the Parliament congratulates Chryston Primary School for achieving an excellent evaluation in the recent HM Inspectorate of Education report in which the encouraging work of both staff and children is recognised and the commitment to maintaining current standards is celebrated; notes the success of recent events in expanding the learning experiences of children, and highlights the improvements in service that continue to be in line with the Curriculum for Excellence. Supported by: Sandra White*, Jamie Hepburn*, Bill Kidd*

S3M-3553 John Wilson: Excellent Chryston Primary School HMIe Report—That the Parliament congratulates Chryston Primary School for achieving an excellent evaluation in the recent HM Inspectorate of Education report in which the encouraging work of both staff and children is recognised and the commitment to maintaining current standards is celebrated; notes the success of recent events in expanding the learning experiences of children, and highlights the improvements in service that continue to be in line with the Curriculum for Excellence. Supported by: Sandra White, Jamie Hepburn, Bill Kidd, Bob Doris*, Hugh O’Donnell*
S3M-3553 Excellent Chryston Primary School HMIe Report (lodged on 26 February 2009) Gil Paterson*
S3M-3553 Excellent Chryston Primary School HMIe Report (lodged on 26 February 2009) Stuart McMillan*
S3M-3553 Excellent Chryston Primary School HMIe Report (lodged on 26 February 2009) Angela Constance*
